values:
I was going to update, but I'm talking to Casey for the first time in months, sorry.

I don't even feel like updating now that I'm done talking to Casey. I need to call Carly. I miss her, and I was supposed to call her about 22 minutes ago. So good bye until then. Reach me after 9pm at 770 757 6201. Don't hesitate to call, good conversation is always welcome. Peace.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/30282.html

So, I've been bumming around town for the past few weeks, and to tell you the truth, it sucks for the most part. I'm broke, I'm homeless, but on the bright side, I have Carly. She kind of everything I have when aside from her, I got the clothes on my back and the contents of a book bag. I don't eat to often anymore, but that's to be expected I guess. I hate panhandling for money. I fucking hate it. I like working for my money. I'm good for it, I earned it you know? No one can take that away from me. I earned what I have. For the most part, I'm pretty happy. Then again, I'm pretty high. Heh.

I just saw a commercial on the History channel. It was like a credit card commercial spoof. At the end it said, "But money can't save you from everything, like the French Revolution." Makes me think of something I just said to Mike, "Ich habe nichts." "But, that's something the rich fucking beaurocrats don't have."

Well, at any rate, I'm going to go to bed. Oh, and I'm staying with Danny and his Dad tonight. That's why I have access to a computer.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/30144.html

So yeah, I know I haven't been around too much or updated too much in the past month or so.. But you know how it goes. I got evicted on the 30th of Nov. and was homeless for a little while. That sucked a good bit. But now I found a job working at Direct Circulation Inc. I travel all around the country selling magazines, encyclopedia sets, and other books to the top 10%(High end- mutli millionaires). I leave tomorrow morning on Greyhound. It's all pretty sudden considering I called about the job yesterday, had an interview yesterday, confirmed the hire today, and now I'm leaving tomorrow. Well, I'll miss everyone, especially my dearest Carly.

...

Well, In other news, I tagged this bomb ass little piece with a pilot magic marker last night. If you want to take a look at it, it's on a metal shed behind the dry cleaners that's right next to the Waffle House in Swuannee at the intersection of P'tree Industrial Blvd. and L'ville Swuannee Rd. Not to mention some other taggs ofcourse, but that piece is all I did. You should be ablke to tell right away who did what. Which also reminds me, I'm going to be doing a lot of tagging and bombing in all the cities and shit that I'm going to be at. At any rate though, It's about time Igo smoke a cigarette and see if I can't get started on packing up  what I need. Good bye everyone, but keep in mind I have free roaming and long distance on my cell phone so give me a ring any time. 770 377 7549

Much love.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/28352.html

ok, so, Im drunk as shit at kev's and I dont give a shit. If this is a little hard to read, you'll have to excuse me. All I know at the moment is that Im content with eveything in my life. I have my own appt. and all the freedom that comes with it. Any ways, Im drunk and very stupid right now, so Im gonna go.
Later
Ben-G
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/10946.html

Apparently I can't seem to hide my journal from either of my parents. And it's just fucking annoying. I remember this one time, I had some privacy, OH! NO! WAIT! I didn't. Fuck the both of you, if you want to know what I'm doing, fucking ask and I'll tell you. If you want to do stupid under handed shit like this, then seriously.. Fuck the both of you. So, in other words, I'm putting my journal back on friends only mode because my parents can't seem to get it through their thick heads that I like my privacy. But hey, you remember that one time when I went snooping through all of your shit.. Oh, no wait.. That never happened, I have the decentcy not to. If I want to know something I ask. And even then, the both of you fucking lied your asses off about tons of shit to me. It's really ironic. Both of you really hated being lied to, I remember being spanked with a frying pan because I lied to my mom. And being spanked with a bread board by my dad for lying. But it's okay for you guys to lie to me, because I'm your child. But it really doesn't matter any more.. I could say some really mean shit, and embarass the hell out of the both of you, which isn't even the slightest extent of what you two ass hats(A person who wears their ass as a hat, i.e. You have your head up your ass) deserve. But I'll have some decentcy..

I like my privacy. Good day.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/5380.html

Well, either Jess bought the beer already and is showing up later and left her phone somewhere... Or she ditched me again. I love making time just for her three nights in a row, just to be ditched. It makes me feel warm and fuckin' fuzzy inside. This weekend has royally sucked, and I need to learn not to rely on people.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/5136.html

Well, I have to go out and buy Counter Strike again because I don't know where in the hell my Counter Strike CD is, and that has the CD Key on it. Therefor I am fucked. Thank you Steam, may you eternally rot and burn in hell forever and ever. And if I ever see you on the street, and somehow know you are the ones responsible for this, I will brutally beat you to a bloody pulp. Let this be a lesson to all, do not fuck with avid gamers.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/5102.html

I hate Fileplanet.com They are so fucking capitolistic it's disgusting. Unless you get the expensive account, you have to wait in line forever to download a stupid mod for a game that was better without it. But Vavle is a douche and is discontinuing 1.5. And if anyone wants to come over tonight, don't.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/4800.html
And we all say good bye to 1.5 forever.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/4600.html

Tonight sucks, last night sucks. Zach should go ahead and go fuck himself. I swear to god he puts people through so much fucking hell it's something you wouldn't even wish on your enemy. Well so much for drinking with Jess. I love being put on the back burner, LOVE IT. Fuck being a nice, fuck this shit, I hate being other people's door matts. I got absolutely nothing to do now for the rest of the night, a big fucking head ache, a house full of fucking stoners, and a piece of shit car that I can't get the fuck away from it all in. I just might kill someone by the end of the night.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/4149.html
I just got a 20 and 4 on cs_assault. Beware my DSL.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/4049.html

August 13, Marrietta, GA at Swayze's Murphy's Kids, Las Cabriolas, and Stuck Lucky. 7:00pm $6 All ages.

August 21, Marietta, GA at Swayze's Big D and the Kids Table, Streetlight Manifesto, Taj Motel Trio, and Treephort. 7:00pm $10 All ages.

Just for refrence, don't worry, no one likes ska besides me any way.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/3694.html

I got my DSL. This week in my new apartment has been crazy. Aside from that.. I don't want to update about anything except this. I really enjoy wearing a mask and my sombrarrow and dancing around, while everyone else is wearing masks and hats too.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/3523.html
I got all my shit back. Yay.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/3075.html
Oh my god! I left all my shit at Wynn's! FUCK!!! I don't have anyone's phone number.. I am so screw it is not even funny. I hate myself.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/2879.html

I got so fuckin' drunk last night. I had a twelve pack all to myself, and a shot of Tequila. I bought that Tequila for Sammich, and man we brought it over to Wynn's.. And like.. BAM! It was an almost empty bottle. I bought three 12 packs.. and all of the sudden there's like 8 beers left. Ah well.. I got mine, no hard feelings. But that just means I don't have to pay the beer pig because I got everyone drunk one night. Awh man.. I was hitting on this one girl there last night. And it was hilarious.. Because I was like, "I know I'm patheticly single, but would you like to date?" "No.." "Yeah.. I wouldn't date me either." Atleast I created some conversation. And they kept telling me I vommited on the pizza box, and I didn't and I we kept fuckin' arguing about it. I don't know who vommited on the pizza box, but you need to go ahead and die. Oh my god.. Denny's commercial reminded me I'm hungry. Peace.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/2578.html
My mom just yelled at me and hung up the phone on me. What a bitch. I just didn't want to go shopping with her, big fuckin' deal. She needs to grow the fuck up.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/2516.html

Shuffling through LJs.. Man, I feel bad for Mike he has to deal with a lot of fuckin' drama. Ah well, That's his business. Aside from that a lot of my old friends seem to be doing quite well.

I talked to an old friend from HS the other day. Premo is going to The University of Hawaii in Manoa. She's doing so good for herself, and she just got back from traveling around the country and squating everywhere. Jon and Beldar are still squating all over. I haven't seen or heard of them in so long. Last time I talked to Jon was a month or so ago, and he was getting out of the drug scene. I'm proud of him. Ah well, no one really knows what the fuck I'm talking about, but I do. And that's all that matters to me at the momment. At any rate, I'm going to get something to drink and start packing my shit up. Peace.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/2168.html

If I have to fucking play CS with dial up one more fucking time, I swear to god I'm going to blugen everyone I see with my modem for the next 24 hours. I can't play for more than a round before my shit lag spikes, or it just full on disconnects. I want to hurt things badly right now. Especially my mother for being so god damn cheap.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/1938.html

Well, Sunday night I ended up drinking with Benson, Stevie, Bort, Al, Miche, and Rachel. We stopped at the gas station on the way home and I gave the clerk a hug. Why? I don't know.. But I did. Any way, Last night I sold my car to Sean, and he got the ins. for it. After that we drove around looking for something to do. Ended up at Jess's. That was nice. I sat outside and talked to Jess for awhile. I really miss our stupid conversations about absolutely nothing. At any rate, I have to take a shower because I'm going to go take my COMPASS test at Gwinnett Tech. After that I'm going to set up a checking account at a bank near there. And then after that, I'm going to go out for the night. End up somewhere silly.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/1541.html

Happy brithday Benny. I miss you bro. To all my friends present, past, and beyond Especially those who weren't with us too long Life is the most precious thing that you could lose While you were here the fun was neverending Laugh a minute only the beginning Kevin, Coleman, Nichols, this one's for you Ever get that feeling you can't go on Just remember whose side it is that you're on You've got friends with you till the end If you're ever in a tough situation We'll be there with no hesitation Brotherhood's our rule that cannot bend When you're feeling too close to the bottom You know who it is you can count on Someone will pick you up again We can conquer anything together All of us are bonded forever if you die I die that's the way it is To all my friends present, past, and beyond To all those who weren't with us too long Life is the most precious thing that you could lose While you were here the fun was neverending Laugh a minute only the beginning Kevin, Coleman, Nichols, this one's for you That's my song for Benny. Not mention the first verse was my toast in his honor. You're always in my mind bro. I love you buddy. See you sooner or later. Either one is fine with me bro. Much love.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/1421.html
Well.. Not going to the show. I think I'm going to call some people and see if they want to hang out. And if not, I'm going to walk to the store and buy some smokes. Fuckin' Chattanooga.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/1106.html

I haven't done anything today. I have just been sitting online and talking to an old member of TTMT. I found a way to the show any way. Shardae and I are going to the show because she's awesome, likes ska, and has a car. Ah well, I have had a very fun day, just sitting around being a llama all day and night. I think Shardae and I are going to hang out tonight, maybe.. Hopefully. I'm more than ready to leave my house now. At any rate, I'm going to do more fun things now.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/972.html

I got Sean the best present ever for his birthday. I got him drunk. He stayed the night at my house. That was lots of fun. He's getting car insurance quotes right now, 'cause we want the car for the ska show tomorrow. The Taj Motel Trio, Go Jimmy Go, and Too Short Notice. Whoo, good times. I forgot what I was doing, but I'm going to do other things now. Bye.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/591.html

Hello. I decided, I need a new journal. I'm no longer a kiddo of sorts, I'm a large frenchman, I would have that screen name, but some cock already has it. Ah well, all my old entries are <lj user="insomnia0kiddo">. At any rate, I've got things to do, Good bye.
http://redletterdropp.livejournal.com/272.html
